author: wn.com
title: Let’s regulate FanDuel, DraftKings
text: A state Assembly member from Brooklyn says he will soon introduce a bill that would regulate daily fantasy sports sites like FanDuel and DraftKings in New York. Assemblyman Felix Ortiz, a Democrat, issued a news release Monday announcing his intentions, pointing to the recent controversy surrounding DraftKings employees winning big on FanDuel and vice versa. [...] The post NY Assembly member: Let’s regulate FanDuel, DraftKings appeared first on Politics on the Hudson. Click on the headline for the rest of this blog post ... ...
